NODE.NAME: MsgFormatVirus
NODE.VALUE: %TimeStamp% - %Scanner% modul - Riasztás a következő számítógépen: %ComputerName%. Objektum: %InfectedObject% - Kártevő: %VirusName%.

NODE.NAME: MsgFormatError
NODE.VALUE: %TimeStamp% – Az %ProgramName% modul végrehajtásakor hiba történt a következő számítógépen: %ComputerName%. A hiba leírása: %ErrorDescription%

NODE.NAME: Params
NODE.VALUE: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><PARAMS><SCHEDULED_TASK PLUGIN="1000600" ACTION="2" DESCRIPTION=""><DATA><NODE NAME="thread_priority" VALUE="FFFFFFFE" TYPE="DWORD" /><NODE NAME="scan_level" VALUE="1" TYPE="DWORD" /></DATA></SCHEDULED_TASK></PARAMS>

NODE.NAME: Params
NODE.VALUE: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><PARAMS><SCHEDULED_TASK PLUGIN="1000600" ACTION="2" DESCRIPTION=""><DATA><NODE NAME="thread_priority" VALUE="FFFFFFFE" TYPE="DWORD" /><NODE NAME="scan_level" VALUE="FFF" TYPE="DWORD" /></DATA></SCHEDULED_TASK></PARAMS>

NODE.NAME: Params
NODE.VALUE: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><PARAMS><SCHEDULED_TASK PLUGIN="1000100" ACTION="0" DESCRIPTION=""><DATA><NODE NAME="FIRST_SCAN" VALUE="1" TYPE="DWORD" /><NODE NAME="TARGETS" VALUE="${DriveSystem}" TYPE="STRING" /></DATA></SCHEDULED_TASK></PARAMS>
